1.label: Led
1.description: 0----outlet on,led on.1----outlet on ,led off.2-----led no work

metadata.inclusion:
1:Refer to your primary controller instructions to process the inclusion / exclusion setup procedure.
2:When prompted by your primary controller, click the PROG button five times in one second
metadata.exclusion:
1:Refer to your primary controller instructions to process the inclusion / exclusion setup procedure.
2:When prompted by your primary controller, click the PROG button five times in one second
metadata.reset:
---Power off ZW96
---keep holding the PROG button
---Power on,Press and keep holding the PROG button for no less than 10 seconds.
Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
